languages.text: Истребив последнего Арбитес в Просторе, Соломон Антар понял, что остался единственным носителем Лекс Империалис в Коронусе. Возложив на себя великую миссию по изничтожению преступности, он годами очищал Простор от беззакония, настигая теневых баронов и пиратских капитанов. Безупречно верный Императору и Его закону, бывший проктор стал символом неумолимости правосудия для жителей Простора.

After exterminating the last of the Arbites in the Expanse, Solomorne Anthar realised he was now the sector's sole wielder of the Lex Imperialis. He placed upon himself a great mission to wipe out crime, and spent years cleansing the Expanse of lawlessness as he hunted down Shadow Barons and pirate captains. Impeccably loyal to the Emperor and His Law, the former Proctor came to symbolise the implacability of justice to all inhabitants of the Expanse.
languages.original_text: Истребив последнего Арбитес в Просторе, Соломон Антар понял, что остался единственным носителем Лекс Империалис в Коронусе. Возложив на себя великую миссию по изничтожению преступности, он годами очищал Простор от беззакония, настигая теневых баронов и пиратских капитанов. Безупречно верный Императору и Его закону, бывший проктор стал символом неумолимости правосудия для жителей Простора.

traits.locale_text: After exterminating the last of the Arbites in the Expanse, Solomorne Anthar realised he was now Koronus's only wielder of the Lex Imperialis. He placed upon himself a great mission to wipe out crime, and spent years cleansing the Expanse of lawlessness as he hunted down Shadow Barons and pirate captains. Impeccably loyal to the Emperor and His law, the former proctor came to symbolise the implacability of justice to Expanse inhabitants.

Impeccably loyal to the Emperor and His Law, the former Proctor came to symbolise the implacability of justice to all inhabitants of the Expanse.

He placed upon himself a great mission to wipe out crime, and spent years cleansing the Expanse of lawlessness as he hunted down Shadow Barons and pirate captains. Impeccably loyal to the Emperor and His Law, the former Proctor came to symbolise the implacability of justice to all inhabitants of the Expanse.

languages.text: Nachdem er die letzten Arbites in der Ausdehnung ausgelöscht hatte, erkannte Solomorne Anthar, dass er nun der einzige Vertreter des Lex Imperia im Sektor war. Er setzte sich selbst zur Aufgabe, das Verbrechen zu vernichten, und säuberte die Ausdehnung jahrelang von Gesetzlosen, indem er Schattenbarone und Piratenkapitäne zur Strecke brachte. Der frühere Proktor war dem Imperator und Seinem Gesetz unverbrüchlich treu und symbolisierte für alle Einwohner der Ausdehnung die Unerbittlichkeit der Gerechtigkeit.
languages.original_text: After exterminating the last of the Arbites in the Expanse, Solomorne Anthar realised he was now the sector's sole wielder of the Lex Imperialis. He placed upon himself a great mission to wipe out crime, and spent years cleansing the Expanse of lawlessness as he hunted down Shadow Barons and pirate captains. Impeccably loyal to the Emperor and His Law, the former Proctor came to symbolise the implacability of justice to all inhabitants of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem er die letzten Arbites in der Ausdehnung ausgelöscht hatte, erkannte Solomorne Anthar, dass er nun der einzige Vertreter des Lex Imperia im Sektor war. Er setzte sich selbst zur Aufgabe, das Verbrechen zu vernichten, und säuberte die Ausdehnung jahrelang von Gesetzlosen, indem er Schattenbarone und Piratenkapitäne zur Strecke brachte. Der frühere Proktor war dem Imperator und Seinem Gesetz unverbrüchlich treu und symbolisierte für alle Einwohner der Ausdehnung die Unerbittlichkeit der Gerechtigkeit.

languages.text: Après avoir exterminé les derniers membres de l'Arbites présents dans les Étendues, Solomorne Anthar se rendit compte qu'il était désormais le seul exécuteur de la Lex Imperialis du secteur. Il se donna alors pour mission d'éradiquer le crime et passa des années à traquer les barons de l'ombre, capitaines pirates et autres hors-la-loi des Étendues. D'une loyauté sans faille envers l'Empereur et Sa Loi, l'ancien proctor devint le symbole de l'implacabilité de la justice pour tous les habitants des Étendues.
languages.original_text: After exterminating the last of the Arbites in the Expanse, Solomorne Anthar realised he was now the sector's sole wielder of the Lex Imperialis. He placed upon himself a great mission to wipe out crime, and spent years cleansing the Expanse of lawlessness as he hunted down Shadow Barons and pirate captains. Impeccably loyal to the Emperor and His Law, the former Proctor came to symbolise the implacability of justice to all inhabitants of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir exterminé les derniers membres de l'Arbites présents dans les Étendues, Solomorne Anthar se rendit compte qu'il était désormais le seul exécuteur de la Lex Imperialis du secteur. Il se donna alors pour mission d'éradiquer le crime et passa des années à traquer les barons de l'ombre, capitaines pirates et autres hors-la-loi des Étendues. D'une loyauté sans faille envers l'Empereur et Sa Loi, l'ancien proctor devint le symbole de l'implacabilité de la justice pour tous les habitants des Étendues.

languages.text: 索罗蒙·安萨彻底清除科罗努斯扩区的法务部残党后，意识到他成为了整个星区唯一一位有权行使帝国律法的人。于是，他将彻底铲除罪恶视为自己的伟大使命，花了无数年时间清理科罗努斯扩区的法外区域，消灭了无数阴影男爵与海盗船长。这位前任监察官凭借着对帝皇与帝国律法无可挑剔的忠诚，成为了科罗努斯扩区所有臣民心中公正与正义的化身。
languages.original_text: After exterminating the last of the Arbites in the Expanse, Solomorne Anthar realised he was now the sector's sole wielder of the Lex Imperialis. He placed upon himself a great mission to wipe out crime, and spent years cleansing the Expanse of lawlessness as he hunted down Shadow Barons and pirate captains. Impeccably loyal to the Emperor and His Law, the former Proctor came to symbolise the implacability of justice to all inhabitants of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 索罗蒙·安萨彻底清除科罗努斯扩区的法务部残党后，意识到他成为了整个星区唯一一位有权行使帝国律法的人。于是，他将彻底铲除罪恶视为自己的伟大使命，花了无数年时间清理科罗努斯扩区的法外区域，消灭了无数阴影男爵与海盗船长。这位前任监察官凭借着对帝皇与帝国律法无可挑剔的忠诚，成为了科罗努斯扩区所有臣民心中公正与正义的化身。
索罗蒙·安萨彻底清除科罗努斯扩区的法务部残党后，意识到他成为了整个扩区唯一一位有权行使帝国律法的人。于是，他将彻底铲除罪恶视为自己的伟大使命，花了无数年时间清理科罗努斯扩区的法外区域，消灭了无数阴影男爵与海盗船长。这位前任监察官凭借着对帝皇与帝国律法无可挑剔的忠诚，成为了科罗努斯扩区所有臣民心中公正与正义的化身。

languages.text: Tras exterminar a los últimos miembros del Arbites en la Extensión, Solomorne Anthar comprendió que se había convertido en el único portador de la Lex Imperialis de todo el sector. Se encomendó la misión de poner fin a todo delito y se pasó años erradicando la anarquía de la Extensión, dando caza a capitanes piratas y barones sombríos. Con una lealtad infalible al Emperador y Su Ley, el antiguo Procurador se convirtió en un símbolo de justicia implacable para todos los habitantes del sector.
languages.original_text: After exterminating the last of the Arbites in the Expanse, Solomorne Anthar realised he was now the sector's sole wielder of the Lex Imperialis. He placed upon himself a great mission to wipe out crime, and spent years cleansing the Expanse of lawlessness as he hunted down Shadow Barons and pirate captains. Impeccably loyal to the Emperor and His Law, the former Proctor came to symbolise the implacability of justice to all inhabitants of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Tras exterminar a los últimos miembros del Arbites en la Extensión, Solomorne Anthar comprendió que se había convertido en el único portador de la Lex Imperialis de todo el sector. Se encomendó la misión de poner fin a todo delito y se pasó años erradicando la anarquía de la Extensión, dando caza a capitanes piratas y barones sombríos. Con una lealtad infalible al Emperador y Su Ley, el antiguo Procurador se convirtió en un símbolo de justicia implacable para todos los habitantes del sector.

languages.text: エクスパンスに残る最後のアービトレイターを一掃した後、ソロモーン・アンサールは自分がこの星域で唯一のレックス・インペリアの執行者であることを悟った。彼は自らに大いなる使命を課し、犯罪を根絶するために長年にわたり法のない混沌を浄化し、影の男爵や海賊船長たちを追い詰めた。皇帝とその法に絶対の忠誠を誓う元代理人である彼は、エクスパンスのすべての住民にとって、揺るぎない正義の象徴となった。
languages.original_text: After exterminating the last of the Arbites in the Expanse, Solomorne Anthar realised he was now the sector's sole wielder of the Lex Imperialis. He placed upon himself a great mission to wipe out crime, and spent years cleansing the Expanse of lawlessness as he hunted down Shadow Barons and pirate captains. Impeccably loyal to the Emperor and His Law, the former Proctor came to symbolise the implacability of justice to all inhabitants of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: エクスパンスに残る最後のアービトレイターを一掃した後、ソロモーン・アンサールは自分がこの星域で唯一のレックス・インペリアの執行者であることを悟った。彼は自らに大いなる使命を課し、犯罪を根絶するために長年にわたり法のない混沌を浄化し、影の男爵や海賊船長たちを追い詰めた。皇帝とその法に絶対の忠誠を誓う元代理人である彼は、エクスパンスのすべての住民にとって、揺るぎない正義の象徴となった。

languages.text: Solomorne Anthar, Enginlik'teki Yargıcıların sonuncusunu da ortadan kaldırdıktan sonra artık Lex İmperialis'in sektördeki tek icracısı olduğunu idrak etti. Suçu kökünden kazımak gibi ulvi bir görevi bizzat kendi yükümlülüğü bildi ve yıllarını Enginlik'i kanunsuzluktan arındırmak amacıyla Gölge Baronlarını ve korsan kaptanlarını avlayarak geçirdi. İmparator'a ve O'nun Kanunu'na zerre halel getirmeyen bir sadakatle bağlı olan eski Üsteğmen, Enginlik'in tüm sakinlerine acımasız adaletin bir sembolü oldu.
languages.original_text: After exterminating the last of the Arbites in the Expanse, Solomorne Anthar realised he was now the sector's sole wielder of the Lex Imperialis. He placed upon himself a great mission to wipe out crime, and spent years cleansing the Expanse of lawlessness as he hunted down Shadow Barons and pirate captains. Impeccably loyal to the Emperor and His Law, the former Proctor came to symbolise the implacability of justice to all inhabitants of the Expanse.
